description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The Plugin Factory Google AdSense for Responsive Design – GARD google-adsense-for-responsive-design-gard allows DOM-Based XSS.This issue affects Google AdSense for Responsive Design – GARD: from n/a through <= 2.23.

product.name: Google AdSense for Responsive Design – GARD
